# Shiny.CWS.ONT

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Shiny.CWS.ONT is to allow users to explore data collected by CWS-Ontario and our partners

## Installation

You can install the development version of Shiny.CWS.ONT from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("dhope/Shiny.CWS.ONT")
```

## Example

Load the app using:

```{r example, eval=F}
library(Shiny.CWS.ONT)
run_shiny_app()

```

Alternatively, download the entire package then open in Rstudio and run:

```{r, eval=F}
pkgload::load_all()
CWS_ON_app()
```
